EmailTemplate.description: Allowing for more advanced operations (i.e. merging fields from multiple records), use this Visualforce template to send an auto-response email informing the customer that a case has been opened. Appearing as a system-generated email, this template contains instructions to update the Case by entering a reply within designated markers to make for the cleanest case comment, free of signature text. Includes merge fields for the auto-population of Case Number, Status, Priority Level, Subject, and Description.
EmailTemplate.name: New Case Auto-Response w/ Markers (VF)
EmailTemplate.subject: Case:
